sections.Trivia:
- Follow Them! Detective Taxi 2 is the sequel of this episode.
- None of the one-shot characters introduced had their actual names shown in their introduction boxes.
- The ground convoyers in this episode are Kanto Kikai Center Mighty Car BN-Series.
- The armored vehicle in this episode is a purplish metallic grey Nissan Elgrand Armored Van (2002: E51 and 2004: E51 Facelift).
- The two singing brothers wearing sunglasses vehicle is 2006 Black Toyota Prius II [NHW20].
- The two singing brothers wearing sunglasses are based on Blue Brothers movies.
- The hatchback next to the armored vehicle is a crystal black pearl Honda Jazz/Fit (GE).
- The TK taxi is a black Toyota Crown. Its license plate is 新宿 500, こ 58・84 (Shinjuku 500, Ko 58・84).
